indexing.verifyStep2: 2. Upload it so it’s accessible at this URL:
indexing.keyFileNotFound: Key file not found or content mismatch. Make sure the file is accessible at the URL below.
indexing.networkError: Network error — could not reach the server.
indexing.tipCrawledNotIndexed: Google found this page but chose not to index it. Improve content quality or submit via the Indexing API.
indexing.tipDiscoveredNotIndexed: Google knows about this page but hasn’t crawled it yet. Submit for indexing to speed this up.
indexing.tipUnknownToGoogle: Google has never seen this URL. Submit it now via the Indexing API.
indexing.tipBlockedRobots: Your robots.txt is blocking Google from crawling this page.
indexing.tipBlockedNoindex: This page has a noindex meta tag. Remove it if you want this page indexed.
indexing.tipSoft404: Google thinks this page is a soft 404. Add meaningful content.
indexing.tipNotFound404: This page returns a 404. Either restore the content or remove it from your sitemap.
indexing.tipIndexed: This URL is indexed by Google. No action needed.
indexing.tipStatusUnknown: Status unknown. Run an inspection to get details.
indexing.tipDefault: Status: {status}. Run a URL inspection for more details.

landing.title: Professional SEO Audit Tool
landing.subtitle: Analyze your website with 20+ SEO metrics. Get a detailed report with actionable recommendations to improve your search rankings.

features.title: Audit Your Website in 3 Simple Steps
features.subtitle: Get a comprehensive SEO analysis without any technical expertise.
features.step1Desc: Paste your website URL and select the metrics you want to analyze. Our crawler starts scanning immediately.
features.step2Desc: We crawl your pages and run 20+ SEO checks in parallel — meta tags, speed, links, structured data, and more.
features.step3Desc: Get a detailed PDF, HTML, or DOCX report with issues, recommendations, and priority scores.
features.feature1Desc: Meta tags, headings, images, speed, security, structured data, broken links, and more.
features.feature2Desc: Watch your audit progress live with real-time updates as pages are crawled and analyzed.
features.feature3Desc: Generate reports in English, Ukrainian, or Russian to match your team or clients.
features.feature4Desc: Download results as PDF, HTML, or DOCX. White-label reports available on Agency plan.
features.feature5Desc: Every issue comes with a clear explanation and specific recommendation on how to fix it.
features.feature6Desc: Parallel analysis with headless browser crawling ensures accurate results in minutes.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you need more.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What SEO metrics does the tool check?
faq.a1: We analyze 20+ metrics including meta tags, headings, images, page speed, broken links, structured data, security headers, mobile responsiveness, URL quality, content duplicates, and more.
faq.q2: How many pages can I audit?
faq.a2: The Free plan allows up to 20 pages per audit. Pro supports up to 200 pages, and Agency up to 1,000 pages per audit.
faq.q3: Do I need technical knowledge to use this tool?
faq.a3: No. Simply enter your website URL and we handle everything. The report includes clear explanations and step-by-step recommendations for each issue found.
faq.a4: Free users can export PDF reports. Pro adds HTML exports. Agency unlocks DOCX and white-label reports with your company branding.
faq.a5: Yes, the Free plan gives you 3 audits per month at no cost. No credit card required.
faq.q6: Can I use this for client reports?
faq.a6: Absolutely. The Agency plan includes white-label reports where you can add your company name, logo, and brand colors.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs.

hero.title: Get Your Pages Indexed by Google in Hours, Not Weeks
hero.subtitle: Connect Google Search Console, see which pages aren't indexed, and submit them to Google, Bing, and Yandex with one click. Monitor everything automatically.

howItWorks.title: Three Steps to Faster Indexing
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign in with Google and connect your Search Console. We'll automatically pull your sites and index data.
howItWorks.step2Desc: View which pages Google has indexed, which ones it hasn't, and why. Get actionable tips to fix indexing issues.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Submit pages to Google, Bing, and Yandex with one click. Enable auto-indexing and get daily reports — we handle the rest.

features.title: Everything You Need for Faster Indexing
features.feature1Desc: Connect your GSC account and pull real index data. See exactly what Google sees — no guessing.
features.feature2Desc: Submit URLs to Google's Indexing API, Bing, Yandex, and DuckDuckGo via IndexNow. Uses your own Google quota — 200 submissions/day included free.
features.feature3Desc: Turn it on and forget about it. We monitor your sitemap daily, detect new pages, and submit them automatically.
features.feature4Desc: We check every URL before submitting. Broken pages, redirects, and noindex tags are flagged so you don't waste credits.
features.feature5Desc: Get a summary every morning: new pages found, URLs submitted, indexing progress, and any issues detected.
features.feature6Desc: Not just data — we tell you why pages aren't indexed and what to do about it. Blocked by robots.txt? Noindex tag? Thin content? We'll flag it.

pricing.title: Simple Credit-Based Pricing
pricing.subtitle: No monthly subscription for indexing. Buy credits when you need them. Each credit = 1 URL submitted to Google. IndexNow submissions (Bing, Yandex, DuckDuckGo) are always free.
pricing.freeNote: IndexNow submissions to Bing, Yandex, and DuckDuckGo are always free — no credits needed.
pricing.quotaNote: Your Google quota (200/day) is included with your Google Search Console connection — credits are only for our submission service.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the Google Indexing API work?
faq.a1: When you submit a URL through our tool, we use Google's official Indexing API to notify Google that your page needs to be crawled and indexed. This is significantly faster than waiting for Google to discover your page naturally.
faq.q2: What's the difference between Google indexing and IndexNow?
faq.a2: Google Indexing API submits to Google specifically and costs 1 credit per URL. IndexNow submits to Bing, Yandex, and DuckDuckGo simultaneously and is completely free — no credits needed.
faq.q3: Do I need a Google Search Console account?
faq.a3: Yes. We pull your site data and index status directly from GSC. You'll connect it via Google OAuth when you sign up — takes about 10 seconds.
faq.a4: Google allows 200 Indexing API submissions per day per account. This limit is on Google's side, not ours. IndexNow has no practical daily limit.
faq.q5: Will this guarantee my pages get indexed?
faq.a5: Submitting a URL tells Google to look at it, but Google still decides whether to index it. Pages with thin content, noindex tags, or other issues may not be indexed even after submission. We show you exactly why and how to fix it.
faq.q6: What happens when I run out of credits?
faq.a6: You can still use all monitoring and GSC features for free. You just can't submit new URLs to Google until you buy more credits. IndexNow submissions remain free.
faq.q7: Can I use this with multiple websites?
faq.a7: Yes. Any site verified in your Google Search Console is available. Credits are shared across all your sites.

cta.heading: Stop Waiting for Google to Find Your Pages
cta.subheading: Connect your Search Console and start indexing in under a minute.
